name: Merrell Thermo Arc II 8 Waterproof Winter Boots - Women's
categories: Thermo Arc II 8 Waterproof Winter Boots
description: Tramping the well trodden paths on winter hikes. Floating across freshly fallen powder on your snowshoes. Enjoying a restorative hot chocolate at the ski chalet when the day is done. These boots are good for all that, and more. They’re warm, supportive, stylish, and built with women’s-specific lasts and midsole designs.Uppers are waterproof nubuck, with polyester mesh bellow tongues.Waterproof TPU lower shells.Polartec® 200 lining with Aegis® antimicrobial treatment, for next-to-foot comfort and odour reduction. Faux fur collar.PrimaLoft® insulation is warm, even if wet.TPU backstay with snowshoe binding strap ridges.Ortholite™ insulating footbeds.Midsoles are triple-density, compression-moulded EVA, with women's specific footframes.Tapered nylon insoles moulded to bottom of foot-frames.Outsoles are winter-specific Vibram® thermo rubber, with 6.5mm lugs.Active temperature rating is -40°C.
